plan(1,init, sentence(true,move(print,"radarlogic STARTS"),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,move( switchplan(doWorkMsgs) ),'','' ))
plan(1,doWorkMsgs, sentence(true,receiveMsg(''),'','' ))
plan(2,doWorkMsgs, sentence(true,printCurrentMessage(''),'','' ))
plan(3,doWorkMsgs, sentence(true,msgswitch(polar, p( DIST,THETA) , move(actorOp,sendDataToGui( DIST,THETA),0,"")),'','' ))
plan(4,doWorkMsgs, sentence(true,move( switchplan(doAlarm) ),'','' ))
plan(5,doWorkMsgs, sentence(true,repeatplan() ,'','' ))
plan(1,doAlarm, sentence(true,msgswitch(polar, p( DIST,THETA) , move(actorOp,checkDistance( DIST,THETA),0,"")),'','' ))
plan(2,doAlarm, sentence( actorOpDone( OP,R),move(print,xxx( OP,R)),'','' ))
plan(3,doAlarm, sentence( actorOpDone( OP,"near"),move(playsound('./audio/tada2.wav',800)),'','' ))
plan(4,doAlarm, sentence( actorOpDone( OP,"proximity"),move(playsound('./audio/any_commander3.wav',800)),'','' ))
plan(5,doAlarm, sentence(true,move(resumeplan),'','' ))
